# enemy

enemy ≈ un¬amigo ≈ inimīcus <> anemigu ≈ nemìg ≈ anmik

𓐍 𓋴 𓍙 𓆑 | opponent|

𒇽𒉽 lu₂kur₂ stranger

𒉽 kur₂ 𒄥 gur queer "strange" 𒉽 KURD stranger

𒁽 gir₅ queer "strange" in 𒉆 𒁽 nam-gir₅ ˢʸnamgir status as stranger

𒉽𒎌 kur₂mes <> krumm 𓀡 ξένο /•creno/ 𒂵𒊑 ga-ri גֵּר ger stranger, foreigner 𒄘𒉈𒊒 gu₂erim₂ √guerre hostile, enemy 𒇽𒉽𒉽𒊏 lu₂kur₂kur₂ra kurkura 𓇥 𓂋 𓇥 𓂋 𓅱 𓀢 𓏥 𓀀 stranger 𒂵𒊑 ga-ri guerry ≠ garrison "enemies" 𒂵𒊑𒅀 ga-re-ia gareia™ "enemy" 𒂵𒊑𒅀 gatrivia :

𓐍 𓏏 𓆑 ceteri : other "4th" outside of biblical trinity?

𓐍 𓏏 𓆑 𓀀 | enemy| χθρός cetervi *ḱétrus शत्रु śátru ಶತ್ರು śatru sattrəw សត្រូវ kẻ thù@Viet! 𓐍𓏏𓆑 +++++
𓐍 𓏏 𓆑 𓀀 | enemy| Kreutzer 𒉽 𒎌 KÚR[dan]𓏥 "enemy" 𓂋 𓏤 𓌒 𓌙 𓀀 𓏥
𓐍 𓏏 𓆑 𓀀 | enemy| 𒉽𒎌 𒂵𒊑𒅀 ga-re-ia gareia™ גֵּר ger stranger, foreigner 𓇥 𓂋 𓇥 𓂋 𓅱 𓀢 𓏥 𓀀

2

թշնամի tʰəʃnɑmi > tusnemy դուշման dušman 2nd fiend⇔friend
opponent ⇔ partner ⇔ nemesis (retribution)

𓐍 𓋴 𓍙 𓆑 | opponent|Caspians
𓐍 𓋴 𓍙 𓆑 | opponent|coursan ≠ courtesan / רר shârar shaw-rar' enemy / courtesanƒ / Kassend ?? / Katzent? / Cousin? / Jason? / קים qîym keem ƒ
